Diablo.name: Shadow Charge
Diablo.description: Charge an enemy, knocking them back, dealing 40 (+4% per level) damage and gaining 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. If the enemy hits terrain, they are Stunned for 1 second and take an additional 120 (+4% per level) damage.

Diablo.name: Fire Stomp
Diablo.description: Unleashes fire waves toward the targeted area that deal 12 (+4% per level) damage each. Once they reach maximum range they return, dealing an additional 36 (+4% per level) damage. Diablo heals for 130% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

Diablo.name: Overpower
Diablo.description: Grabs the target and slams it behind Diablo, dealing 73 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning for 0.25 seconds.

Diablo.name: Apocalypse
Diablo.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

Diablo.name: Lightning Breath
Diablo.description: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.  Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

Diablo.name: Black Soulstone
Diablo.description: Repeatable Quest: Gain 10 Souls per Hero killed and 1 Soul per Minion, up to 100. For each Soul, gain 0.4% maximum Health. If Diablo has 100 Souls upon dying, he will resurrect in 5 seconds but lose 100 Souls.

1.name: Feast on Fear
1.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower heals Diablo for 12% of his maximum Health over 3 seconds.

1.name: Devil's Due
1.description: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2.25% per Soul.

1.name: Soul Shield
1.description: Activate to gain 25 plus 50% of Diablo's current Souls as Spell Armor for 4 seconds.  Every time Diablo damages an enemy Hero, reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Sacrificial Soul
4.description: Stunning a Hero with Shadow Charge grants 5 Souls and 20 Armor for 4 seconds. While at 100 Souls, increase this Armor to 40.

4.name: Souls to the Flame
4.description: Fire Stomp grants 1 Soul every 3 times it damages an enemy Hero, and heals for an additional 1.3% of its damage dealt per Soul.

4.name: Life Leech
4.description: Diablo gains 1 Soul and heals for 1.5% of his maximum Health when Basic Attacking an enemy Hero. While at 100 Souls, increase this healing to 3% of his maximum Health.

7.name: Eternal Flames
7.description: When Diablo Stuns an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower, reset the cooldown of Fire Stomp.

7.name: Malevolence
7.description: Basic Abilities cause Diablo's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal an additional 100 (+4% per level) Spell Damage. Stores up to 2 charges.

7.name: Diabolical Momentum
7.description: When Diablo's Basic Attacks damage enemies, reduce the cooldown of his Basic Abilities by 0.75 second.

10.name: Apocalypse
10.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

10.name: Lightning Breath
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.  Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

13.name: Devastating Charge
13.description: Increase Shadow Charge's terrain collision damage by 80%.  Quest: Each time an enemy Hero takes terrain collision damage, increase this bonus by 20%, to a maximum of 120%.

13.name: Cruelty
13.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower increases Diablo's Attack Speed by 50% for 7 seconds, up to 100%.

13.name: Hellfire
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp grants 2% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.

16.name: Domination
16.description: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

16.name: Debilitating Flames
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are Slowed by 5% for 4 seconds, up to 50%. Heroes Slowed by 25% or more by Debilitating Flames deal 50% less damage.

16.name: Overpowering Nightmare
16.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Overpower, with a 2 second cooldown between uses.

20.name: Dying Breath
20.description: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit (to a minimum of 5 seconds) and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

20.name: Lord of Terror
20.description: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes and gain 5 Souls per Hero hit.

20.name: Hellgate
20.description: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.
